imdb.plot outline: Redemption: Between the Lines" is a prison documentary that explores a jail facility in the Rio Grande Valley of Texas. This documentary provides an inside glimpse of the facility that is near the border between Mexico and The United States of America. Redemption: Between the Lines allows inmates to share their unique individual stories, talents and/or success. While some inmates aim to leave the confines of their cell in an attempt to become better citizens, others remain proud of the unlawful acts they have committed. Redemption also gives them the opportunity to express their thoughts on life and the world in general, in relation to their criminal past, looking forward to a brighter future.
imdb.title: Redemption: Between the Lines
plot: Explores a jail facility in the Rio Grande Valley of Texas.

_Redemption: Between the Lines_ (qv)" is a prison documentary that explores a jail facility in the Rio Grande Valley of Texas. This documentary provides an inside glimpse of the facility that is near the border between Mexico and The United States of America. _Redemption: Between the Lines_ (qv) allows inmates to share their unique individual stories, talents and/or success. While some inmates aim to leave the confines of their cell in an attempt to become better citizens, others remain proud of the unlawful acts they have committed. Redemption also gives them the opportunity to express their thoughts on life and the world in general, in relation to their criminal past, looking forward to a brighter future.::Jackie
